column2: "It is estimated that Darkers have infiltrated several portions of the ship."
"All ARKS are to exercise their best judgment in confirming the safety of each area."
"All Darkers are to be destroyed on sight, no exceptions."
"Me? I'm here because of the emergency directive. I am an ARKS member, after all."
"Master Gettemhart isn't here. But I am more than capable of holding my own."
"But if it is alright with you, <%me>, would you mind if I accompany you?"
"It need not be for the entire time, just for a while."
